message: The DOC_METHOD field for indicator 2-2-2b, translated into en
data:
Methods and guidance:

Recommendations for data collection, analysis and reporting on anthropometric indicators in children under 5 years of age (WHO/UNICEF, 2019)

UNICEF-WHO-World Bank 2020. Technical notes from the country consultation on SDG Indicators 2.2.1 on stunting, 2.2.2a on wasting and 2.2.2b on overweight

Analysis tool: WHO Anthro Survey Analyser (shinyapps.io)
